thread.title: Netflix plans massive movie drop as Disney threat looms

title: Netflix plans massive movie drop as Disney threat looms
text:
Netflix plans massive movie drop as Disney threat looms 7:24am EDT - 02:10
Netflix plans to release 80 original movies in 2018, a staggering number that surpasses the planned output for the year of Hollywood's top four traditional studios combined. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
Netflix plans to release 80 original movies in 2018, a staggering number that surpasses the planned output for the year of Hollywood's top four traditional studios combined.
